item.title: Inverse Matrices - A Primer
item.description: In this post we talk about the inverse matrix. We discuss what it means for a matrix to be invertible. We then discuss what it means for a matrix not to be invertible - singular. Finally, we briefly go through how to find a matrix’s inverse.

item.title: Rank of a Matrix
item.description: The dimension of the column space of a matrix is called its rank.

item.title: A Matrix Nullspace (Kernel) Tutorial - Finding the Nullspace
item.description: In this article we describe what the nullspace is. We go on to explain how to find the nullspace.

item.title: Of Matrices and Men (pt. 2)
item.description: In my last post we saw how a matrix could operate on a vector to produce a result…

item.title: Of Matrices and Men (pt. 1)
item.description: One of the most crucial changes in my viewpoint came when I learned that matrices, much like functions, act on inputs. Until then, a matrix was just a collection of numbers and matrix multiplication was just a mechanical set of rules used to produce another collection of numbers. I knew that the result of matrix multiplication could be a scalar, a vector or another matrix… but I abandoned any further investigations.

item.title: Hi There. This is my first post. Or: Linear Algebra, bra?
item.description: I need a place to document my various ideas as well as the potential results of those ideas.
